bibl.title: Family Relations in Early Roman Tebtunis.
bibl.note: Discusses two families in Tebtynis, who were interrelated through marriage and whose economic activities are illustrated in relative detail by various documents from the grapheion archive: the descendants of Lusimachos and those of Herakleides the younger. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: PalArch's Journal of Archaeology of Egypt / Egyptology

bibl.seg: A.M.F.W. Verhoogt, Family Relations in Early Roman Tebtunis.
PalArch's Journal of Archaeology of Egypt / Egyptology 1, 3 (2004) pp. 21-25.

Discusses two families in Tebtynis, who were interrelated through marriage and whose economic activities are illustrated in relative detail by various documents from the grapheion archive: the descendants of Lusimachos and those of Herakleides the younger. - Avec résumé en anglais.
